A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
I am a fan and brought my whole family.
This movie had redeeming features but lost all credibility due to the following:
The butchering of Luke's character
The ridiculous lack of character development for Snoke
The Leia Poppins moment
Not killing off Leia now that Carrie Fisher has passed
This film had potential but took too many wrong turns...
